Html:
I have developed an Application which convert an audio file to text file but my problem is that it only converts files which are in US accent.
using system.speech.recognition in c#
I am a Pakistani and i want to convert files which are in Pakistani accent
Can I change the accent???
Is there any help???
system.speech.recognition is not part of NAudio, so I'm afraid I have no knowledge of whether the Microsoft speech recognition supports different accents.
